title: My CatPots by MaxSRarity
description: A cute little cat-themed game that I had the opportunity to contribute during the freelancing apprenticeship period. It was a fun project to work on, and I learned a lot about how to effectively manage user data in a game.

title: Tile Cat - Triple Match Puzzle by MaxSRarity
description: Another cat-themed game that I contributed during the freelancing apprenticeship period. It was a big opportunity to learn how to make a level design tool and manage levels data effectively.
